name: Hues Of Pottery
description:
2048x1152
Pottery is among the most timeless living craft traditions of India. From flower pots, terracotta chimes to the thirst-quenching and Matka(Water pot), pottery is practiced across the length and breadth of the country. A visit to the countryside and “potter’ villages” speaks volumes about the economic importance of this craft. In many parts of India, along with subsistence agriculture, people engage in pottery using traditional manual potter’s wheels and kilns, making earthenware an integral part of urban market spaces, especially during the festive season.
